tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We visited Sri The Dentist Dental Care for my father's artificial teeth. Dr. Saritha did the examination and patiently explained the situation and options available for solution and helped us made the right choice. The product was acquired in the said time and treatment was done smoothly. Best part is after care, she is always available and took care of my father's concerns and feedbacks and accordingly treated again. Overall, it was a pleasant experience and satisfying treatment. Way to go Dr. Saritha and Sri The Dentist. All the best...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
The doctor explained the issue in simple terms and gave an unambiguous review of my issue. She made sure that the procedure was done with minimal pain. Further, she also ensured that the feel post procedure was fine and there was no discomfort. 
Overall, i can recommend her to people i care about.

Root Canal Treatment was painless, satisfied with services and explanations of all the doctors involved during procedure. Only one point of dissatisfaction was payment method, as customers need to pay 2% more, if payment is done from credit card or debit card. But if you have google pay, then no extra payment is required.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The experience was good, my issue was addressed and further precautions were provided. Would again visit after 6 months as advised.
Dr. Saritha is very friendly.  Treatment is also very good. No problem faced by my daughter Srijita, during her RCT treatment. She also explained the procedure along with the treatment.

review: Dr Saritha is a very friendly doctor. She diagnosed the problem and gave apt solution for my mother and daughter. She shows utmost patience and care and the job was done with great precision.

review: Very friendly . Done my wisdom tooth extraction very professionally .Very much satisfied with the service .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Problem was explained to me very clearly  each step was told before doing and all appointments were painless the doctors are very professional and found it value for investing :after visiting many clinics I found good doctors :I'm very happy

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr saritha mam is Good and friendly and explained to me and suggested good treatment  now I am good with the treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Sarita gives time to listen and understand the patient's problem.
Explains clearly what the treatment would be and gives lot of confidence to the patient, especially young ones who need it the most.
She is very reliable and does what is best for the patient.
Wish her all success.
reply_text: thank you so much for feed back

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: my back tooth was paining a lot and I realised it's wisdom tooth and went to Sri the dentist on reference of one of my friend ,the entire procedure was so painless and the team of doctors here is very experienced,I recommend Dr Saritha and her team to everyone who is in need of dental treatments ...I felt they are very genuine too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Ceramic Braces Fixing, Tooth Extraction,Straightening Teeth (Conventional Braces),
review: I am getting ceramic braces and had to get 4 pre-molars extracted. The process was seamless and pain-free. Dr. Saritha was extremely helpful and attentive to any questions I had. I would definitely recommend this clinic to people in need of any dental work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.saritha mam was very friendly n understanding person. if we ask any question which we feel and she answer  it very patiently and I feel happy to visit ,her dental hospital .
